interpretation:
The "Dim Button" card represents a moment of pause, rest, and reflection. It suggests the need to take a step back and allow yourself to slow down. This card reminds you that sometimes it's necessary to switch off and take a break from the demands of the world around you. It's a call to be patient and allow things to unfold at their own pace.

When this card appears in a reading, it may suggest that you need to take some time out to recharge your batteries. It's a reminder that it's okay to take a break and not be constantly on the go. This card can also represent a need for self-reflection and introspection. Take the time to look inward and evaluate your thoughts and feelings.

The "Dim Button" card also encourages you to practice patience. Allow things to unfold naturally and don't rush the process. This card reminds you that sometimes the best things in life take time and effort to achieve. Trust the journey and have faith that everything will work out in the end.
